title: Matt Ryan non-committal on Michael Penix Jr. as Falcons starting QB, defers decision to Kevin Stefanski

sources.name: CBS Sports NFL
sources.title: Matt Ryan non-committal on Michael Penix Jr. as Falcons starting QB, defers decision to Kevin Stefanski
sources.description: Penix and Kirk Cousins split starting duties over the last two seasons and remain under contract for 2026
